name: 王鴻祥
objective: 本課程的目的是協助研究生準備進行有關設計創造力開發、創意設計手法與設計方法論等主題之碩士論文研究或實務專題設計，提供各種理論工具與個案演練。課程內容包括(1)人工智慧、心理學、人類學和語言學等導向之設計創造力研究，以及(2)規則式與案例式推理、基模類比與聯想、產品俗民誌、模式語言和體驗劇本等創意設計手法演練。
schedule:
Unit 1 Introduction: What is design creativity?
Unit 2 How do we study design creativity?
Unit 3 Metaphor Design Theory: A similiarity-based approach to design creativity research
Unit 4 How do we measure similiarity?
Unit 5 Basics: what is set and fuzzy set?
Unit 6 How do we measure fuzzy similiarity?
Unit 7 How do we inquire by fuzzy scales?
Unit 8 How do we clustering?
Unit 9 How do we conduct fuzzy clustering?
Unit 10 Empirical Study: How do we test Metaphor Design Theory by real-world designs?
scorePolicy:
出席率：20%
課堂實習：20%
實證研究報告：50%
